subject: Parenting
title: Stranger Anxiety
description: A fast breakdown of Stranger Anxiety for builders.

hook.text: Your friendly baby suddenly screams when grandma reaches for her.

buildup.text: Stranger anxiety appears around eight months and peaks near the first birthday.

twist.text: The baby isn't rude. Her memory just got good enough to know who's safe.
